pages.title: Snowy Forest
pages.text: The Snowy Forest is home to the towering boughs of fir trees, deep snow drifts, and

legendary ice caves where strange, furry creatures lurk. Deep within these woods, the mournful howls of wolves can be heard on the icy wind. Ancient lore speculates on a breath-takingly high fortress built of glowing brick located here, behind a sheer wall of ice. The snow here certainly covers many secrets beneath its silent, white blankets...
